keyMoments.title: Young Koza Confronts King Cobra
keyMoments.description: In flashback, young Koza storms into the palace to confront King Cobra about the drought affecting his village, showing his early passion for helping his people.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Koza's character as someone who has always fought for his people, foreshadowing his later role as rebel leader.

keyMoments.title: Koza Makes Vivi Assistant Leader
keyMoments.description: After a challenge, Koza recognizes Vivi's strength and makes her assistant leader of the Sand-Sand Clan, establishing their friendship.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the bond between Koza and Vivi that makes the current rebellion so tragic.
keyMoments.quote: From now on, you're the assistant leader of the Sand-Sand Clan!

keyMoments.title: Koza Defeats Agotogi and Receives His Scar
keyMoments.description: Koza defeats the kidnapper Agotogi to protect Vivi but receives a permanent scar across his left eye in the process.
keyMoments.significance: The defining moment of Koza's character, showing his willingness to sacrifice for friends. The scar becomes his permanent mark.

keyMoments.title: Koza's Noble Declaration to King Cobra
keyMoments.description: When thanked by King Cobra, Koza humbly states he protected Vivi because she's his friend, not because she's a princess.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Koza's humble character and that his loyalty is to people, not status.
keyMoments.quote: I did it for a friend.

keyMoments.title: Koza Leaves for Yuba
keyMoments.description: Koza tells Vivi he's leaving with his father to help build Yuba, encouraging her to become a great princess.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the separation of childhood friends and sets up Koza's connection to Yuba.
keyMoments.quote: I'm going to help build Yuba with my own two hands. You become a great princess, Vivi!

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Rebel Leader
keyMoments.description: Vivi reveals to Nami that her childhood friend Koza is now the leader of the rebel army.
keyMoments.significance: The emotional climax showing how manipulation has turned friends into enemies.

relationships.description: Koza and Vivi were childhood friends through the Sand-Sand Clan. Koza protected Vivi from kidnappers and received his scar. Despite now leading the rebellion against her father's kingdom, their friendship remains important to both.

evolutionMoments.description: Koza makes Vivi assistant leader of the Sand-Sand Clan after she challenges him.
Koza receives his scar protecting Vivi from kidnappers, cementing their bond.

relationships.description: Koza is Toto's son. They left together to help develop Yuba.

Koza first met King Cobra as a child complaining about drought. Later, Cobra thanked him for saving Vivi. Now Koza leads a rebellion against Cobra's kingdom, though unaware of Crocodile's manipulation.

reveals.information: Childhood leader of the Sand-Sand Clan and friend to Princess Vivi
Received his scar protecting Vivi from kidnappers as a child
Leader of the rebel army fighting against the Alabasta Kingdom
Left Alabasta capital with his father Toto to help develop Yuba

keyMoments.title: Toto's Introduction
keyMoments.description: Toto appears for the first time as Koza's father, having accepted the position to help develop Yuba Oasis into a town.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Toto and establishes Yuba as an important location for the arc.

keyMoments.title: Toto and Koza Leave for Yuba
keyMoments.description: Toto and his son Koza leave for Yuba to help build it into a proper town.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Toto's role as the developer of Yuba and foreshadows the drought storyline.

relationships.description: Toto is Koza's father. They work together to develop Yuba.

reveals.information: Representative tasked with developing Yuba Oasis

keyMoments.title: Agotogi Attempts to Kidnap Vivi
keyMoments.description: Agotogi and his gang of bandits attempt to kidnap young Princess Vivi for ransom.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the dangerous situation that leads to Koza's defining heroic moment.

keyMoments.title: Agotogi Defeated by Young Koza
keyMoments.description: Despite being an armed adult, Agotogi is defeated by the young Koza, but manages to slash Koza's eye with his sword.
keyMoments.significance: Agotogi's attack gives Koza his permanent scar, making him the cause of one of Koza's most distinctive features.

reveals.information: Bandit who attempted to kidnap Princess Vivi
Gave Koza his scar during the kidnapping attempt

keyMoments.title: Vivi Begins Her Childhood Story
keyMoments.description: Vivi shares her childhood memories with Nami, beginning the emotional flashback.
keyMoments.significance: Opens the window into Vivi's past and her relationship with Koza.
keyMoments.quote: Let me tell you about when I was a child, and about a boy I knew...

keyMoments.title: Young Vivi Meets Koza
keyMoments.description: In flashback, young Vivi calls Koza a crybaby after witnessing him run from the palace in tears.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the beginning of Vivi and Koza's relationship.

keyMoments.title: Vivi Joins the Sand-Sand Clan
keyMoments.description: Vivi challenges Koza for leadership of the Sand-Sand Clan, showing her desire to be treated as an equal.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Vivi's rejection of special treatment due to her royal status.

keyMoments.title: Vivi Reveals Koza is the Rebel Leader
keyMoments.description: Vivi emotionally reveals to Nami that her childhood friend Koza now leads the rebellion against her father.
keyMoments.significance: The emotional climax showing the personal tragedy of the conflict.
keyMoments.quote: That Koza... is now the leader of the rebel army.

relationships.description: Vivi and Koza were childhood friends through the Sand-Sand Clan. Koza protected her from kidnappers, receiving his scar. The revelation that Koza now leads the rebellion breaks Vivi's heart.

evolutionMoments.description: Vivi challenges Koza and becomes vice leader of the Sand-Sand Clan.
Koza receives his scar protecting Vivi, deepening their bond.

reveals.information: Was vice leader of the Sand-Sand Clan as a child
Was nearly kidnapped as a child, saved by Koza
Childhood friend of rebel leader Koza
